name: EncouragingQuotes(FlashBriefingversion)
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des: Encouraging Quotes provides random quotes that are encouraging, uplifting, and sometimes comical witticisms to brighten your day. The quote played is also displayed as a card in the Alexa App. Because the quotes are picked randomly, every time you listen to your Flash Briefing the quote is usually different. New quotes will be added regularly.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
